title: 1932년 Barto 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Barto. 판결일: 1932-02-24. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ray BARTO v. STATE
**판결일**: 1932-02-24
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Lattimore

## 변호인

John A. Cook, of Mt. Pleasant, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 46 S.W.2d 1114

## 판결문 요약


LATTIMORE, J.
Conviction for murder; punishment, two years in the penitentiary.
We find in the record neither statement of facts nor bills of exception. All matters of procedure appear regular.
The judgment will be affirmed.
...
